mapper.select: select boardNo, boardName, boardDesc, isPublic, createdBy, createdAt, status from tbl_board WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY createdAt DESC
select DEPARTMENTNAME,DEPARTMENTNO from tbl_department where departmentname like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
mapper.update: update tbl_board set boardName = #{boardName}, boardDesc = #{boardDesc}, isPublic = #{isPublic} where boardNo = #{boardNo}
update tbl_board set status=0 where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT to_char(b.boardNo) AS boardNo , b.boardName FROM tbl_board b LEFT JOIN tbl_board_department bd ON b.boardNo = bd.fk_boardNo WHERE b.isPublic = 1 and status = 1 OR bd.fk_departmentNo = (SELECT fk_departmentNo FROM tbl_employee WHERE employeeNo = 100013)

choose.when: INSERT INTO tbl_post (postNo, fk_boardNo, fk_employeeNo, name, subject, content, allowComments, isNotice, noticeEndDate) VALUES (postSeq.nextval, #{fk_boardNo}, 100013, '이상우', #{subject}, #{content}, #{allowComments}, #{isNotice}, TO_DATE(#{noticeEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO tbl_post (postNo, fk_boardNo, fk_employeeNo, name, subject, content, allowComments) VALUES (postSeq.nextval, #{fk_boardNo}, 100013, '이상우', #{subject}, #{content}, #{allowComments})

mapper.select: SELECT V.postNo, V.fk_boardNo, V.fk_employeeNo, V.name, V.subject, V.content, V.readCount, V.regDate, V.commentCount, V.allowComments, V.status, V.isNotice, V.noticeEndDate, b.boardNo, b.boardName FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY postNo DESC) AS rno, postNo, fk_boardNo, fk_employeeNo, name, subject, content, readCount, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDate, commentCount, allowComments, status, isNotice, noticeEndDate FROM tbl_post WHERE status = 1 ) V JOIN tbl_board b ON V.fk_boardNo = b.boardNo WHERE rno BETWEEN to_number(#{startRno}) AND to_number(#{endRno})
select count(*) from tbl_post where status = 1

select B.boardName,B.createdBy,P.postNo,P.fk_boardNo,P.fk_employeeNo,p.name,P.subject,P.content,P.readCount,P.regDate,P.commentCount from tbl_post P join tbl_board B on P.FK_BOARDNO = B.boardNo where postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_post set readCount = readCount + 1 where postNo = to_number(#{postNo})
mapper.select: select postNo, fk_boardNo, fk_employeeNo, name, subject, content, readCount, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS regDate, commentCount, allowComments, status, isNotice, noticeEndDate from tbl_post WHERE ROWNUM =1 order by postNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_postFile(fileNo, fk_postNo, orgFilename, fileName, fileSize) values(postFileSeq.nextval,#{postNo},#{originalFilename}, #{newFileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select: select postNo, filename, substr(func_post_photo_upload_delete(postNo), 2) AS photofilename from tbl_post p full join tbl_postFile F on p.postNo = F.fk_postNo where postNo = #{postNo}
